property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks, your Outrage can't be blocked this turn and your opponent discards 2 cards at random from their hand. {DOUBLE BREAKER} {DORON GO} Byte or Hell:When this creature is destroyed, you may put an exile creature that has "Byte" or "Hell" in its name from your hand into the battle zone. ■ You can't put other exile creatures that have "Majikkuma Taki" in their name into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Each of your Oracles in the battle zone gets "slayer". card.name: Jesus Mary Chain, True Flashing Right God

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature wins a battle, your opponent chooses and destroys one of their creatures. {DOUBLE BREAKER} {RIGHT GOD LINK} (As you put this creature into the battle zone, you may link this creature to a God that has "Center God Link" or "Left God Link". The linked god gets each god's characteristics (power and abilities) and becomes one creature. When the linked creature would leave the battle zone, choose one side instead.) ■ While this creature is linked, whenever you win a battle, you may return a colorless card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Diva Live, Channeler of Suns Trick

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GRAVITY ZERO} If you have a Mecha Del Sol in the battle zone you may cast this spell for no cost. ■ Ignore any abilities that prevent your creatures from attacking this turn. (However, summoning sickness isn't ignored.) ■ At the end of the turn, untap all your creatures in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Your opponent chooses 2 of his untapped creatures in the battle zone and returns them to their owners' hands.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Your opponent chooses one of their creatures and destroys it. Then destroy one of your creatures.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ You may summon exile creatures from your mana zone. {SHIELD GO} (When this creature is destroyed, put it face up into your shield zone. When this creature is face up and would leave your shield zone, put it into your graveyard instead.) ■ While this card is face-up in your shield zone, each of your exile creatures gets +3000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's untapped creatures in the battle zone and put it into its owner's mana zone. ■ Return a creature from your mana zone to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. From among them, add one to your shields face down and put the other into your mana zone. {DOUBLE BREAKER} {DORON GO} Gonbuto or Treasure:When this creature is destroyed, you may put an exile creature that has "Gonbuto" or "Treasure" in its name from your hand into the battle zone. ■ You can't put other exile creatures that have "Shining Kinji" in their name into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GRAVITY ZERO} If you have a God in the battle zone you may cast this spell for no cost. ■ Choose one of your creatures in the battle zone. If it's a God, until the start of your next turn, when that creature would leave the battle zone, it stays in the battle zone instead. If it's not a God, until the start of your next turn, when that creature would be destroyed, it stays in the battle zone instead.

property.name: Rules

If it's not a God, until the start of your next turn, when that creature would be destroyed, it stays in the battle zone instead.
